content.rendered:
Welcome to The Guardsman

A 5 star hotel in Westminster, London

Westminster, London's most iconic address

Welcome to The Guardsman

Tucked away on an unsuspecting street just a stone’s throw from Buckingham Gate, The Guardsman is one of Westminster’s best-kept secrets. A stay at our luxury hotel and residence is an opportunity to indulge in a truly personal experience, complete with members’ club-style service and a warm welcome for everyone who walks through our doors.

 

Book our Best Available Rate or Bed & Breakfast directly and receive the following benefits:

  • Breakfast included
  • Welcome drink on arrival
  • Early check-in or late check-out subject to availability
  • Upgrade to the next room category subject to availability at the time of arrival
  • Welcome amenity

6 Minute walk to Buckingham Palace

STAY WITH US

Rooms

After a day spent discovering the city, escape to your own corner of the capital. Effortlessly stylish and cosy, they’re full of all the little luxuries you’d expect from a five-star stay, including sink-into beds, bespoke toiletries, and a well-stocked minibar for those well-deserved nightcaps.

VIEW ROOMS

What our guests say

“We were VERY happy with the Guardsman. All the staff were great and very helpful. The location was amazing...close to Buckingham Palace and Big Ben in a super safe area. Parks were very close as well.”

Matthew Atwell, Google 

One of the best boutique hotels I have ever stayed in.Staff welcoming, went above and beyond to help.It is well placed next to Buckingham Palace and minutes to St James Park underground. I would recommend this hotel to solo travellers and couples.

Keenan H, Tripadvisor 

Absolutely blown away by the personal service. A very special 5* boutique hotel that is extremely good value for money!

Duane Paterson, Google

The hotel staff were outstanding. From check in to departure they couldn’t do enough to help. It was a great hotel to come back to after a long day shopping and sightseeing. Very peaceful and a good place to unwind. We’ll definitely be back.

Rm77_11, Tripadvisor

The location of the hotel is lovely, tucked away in a smart quiet road which is a super quick and easy walk to Buckingham Palace and multiple tube stations. I would definitely recommend this hotel and will be back myself on my next trip to London

Vicki, Tripadvisor

Had a truly amazing experience here with my girlfriend. The staff were so friendly and were always happy to help with anything! The room we stayed in was just perfect too. The level of service was exactly what you’d expect from a hotel like this. We will be back!

Grant McLean, Google

Incredible stay at this hotel with myself and my partner. Very clean and comfortable in a superb location. Highly recommend staying again.

Daniel Harley, Google

Very comfortable, cosy, beautifully appointed boutique hotel and excellent customer service. Lots of nice little finishing touches in room, great shower, coffee, toiletries very good breakfast options. Would certainly come again and recommend to others.

Deborah Harrison, TripAdvisor

2 minute walk from St. James's underground station

Stay with us

Residences

The Guardsman is more than a hotel; it’s a haven. Our six residences are perfect for anyone looking for a regular base in London. Whether you need one, two or three bedrooms, all of these pied à terres are sumptuous, beautifully designed and completely self-contained. Inside, you’ll find a private kitchen and dining area, space to work and state-of-the-art technology. You can even add a private chef, a valet and 24-hour room service.

VIEW RESIDENCES

THE DINING ROOM AND BAR AT THE GUARDSMAN

No service times, just suggestions

Dining at The Guardsman highlights our laid-back approach to luxury. On the ground floor, you'll find the cosy and contemporary Drawing Room. Comfortable armchairs, enveloping sofas and a carefully curated art collection combine to lend a club-like atmosphere. On the lower ground floor, the Dining Room offers a menu that changes with the seasons to showcase the very best produce.

OUR SAMPLE MENUS

AN ICONIC DESTINATION

Our neighbourhood

51.4989752,-0.139153,17

On our doorstep, you'll find one of London's most iconic neighbourhoods, St James's. Famous palaces, parks, and the QE Conference Centre are all a short walk away. Stroll to Tate Britain through residential streets, wander through the endless parks, or hop on the tube to discover everything that London has to offer from our incredible location. St. James's Park Underground station is just 100m away whilst the central hub that is Victoria Station is also within close walking distance.

2 mins

The Suffragette Memorial in Christchurch Gardens

6 mins

St. James's Park is at one end of Buckingham Gate

11 mins

London Victoria Station and the heart of Westminster are easily accessible

In the news

FOLLOW US ON INSTAGRAM | #THEGUARDSMAN

@theguardsman

serpData.title: The Guardsman | 5 Star Hotel In Westminster
serpData.description: A boutique hotel with the feel of a members club in London's most iconic address in Westminster. Relaxed luxury & personalised service near Buckingham Palace.
